= ROX-Trasher =

This is a modified "Trash" Rox-App original wroten for Puppy Linux by Dan Van Wormer and
adapted for non-distribution, user specific and actual version of Rox-Filer.    


= NEWS =

Version 0.4
---------------

- Now restore the desktop shortcut if the trashed item has one.
- Check if you own the item, if not, a warning message is displayed.
- The status .DirIcon of the trashcan now is linked, not copied.

= REQUERIMENTS =

zenity >= 2.12.1 (or less?)
